channel.title: Blogs on Jonas
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Jonas

item.title: Improving the little things
item.description: Improving the little things In this blog post you’ll learn which small changes you can do for your app, in order to create a better experience for your users. We’re focussing on Flutter apps for Android and iOS. Acoustic and haptic feedback for a better UX Flutter has various APIs to enrich the UX with haptic or audio feedback. The first API is HapticFeedback. It vibrates the device according to the method names.

item.title: German companies using Flutter
item.description: German companies using Flutter This listicle is about german companies using Flutter. Without further ado, lets go straight to them. team neusta team neusta is a german holding with its headquater is in Bremen. They’re mostly doing consulting for other companies. Among its companies neusta infomantis and neusta mobile solutions are using Flutter. Neusta infomantis build, among other apps, the app for the local soccer club VfL Osnabr√ºck. It’s available for Android and iOS.

item.title: My Flutter Packages
item.description: My Flutter Packages I’ve created some nice libraries for Flutter. Feedback feedback on pub.dev This is a package which tries to make it really easy to gather feedback from your users. See here for more info. Unleash unleash ob pub.dev Unleash is a feature toggle service. My package is the recommended unofficial client for Dart as seen in the official repository. Splash splash ob pub.dev Splash is a collection of alternativ button clicked effects for Flutter.
